name: tm55
effect: Teaches Brine to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Scald to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Brine)

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
If the foe’s HP is down to under half,
this attack will hit with double the
power.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
If the foe’s HP is down to under half,
this attack will hit with double the
power.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
If the foe’s HP is down to under half,
this attack will hit with double the
power.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user shoots boiling hot water at
its target. It may also leave the
target with a burn.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user shoots boiling hot water at
its target. It may also leave the
target with a burn.

The user shoots boiling hot water at
its target. This may also leave the
target with a burn.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user shoots boiling hot water at its target.
This may also leave the target with a burn.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user shoots boiling hot water at its target.
This may also leave the target with a burn.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy.
This may also leave the target frozen.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
If the target’s HP is half or less, this attack will hit
with double the power.
